templates.content:
That's a great question! The difference between the UVS100 Original and the UVS100 Premier Series Custom Sunscreens is mainly in the appearance and included accessories, not performance.

Both are custom-fit to your vehicle's windshield and built with the same core materials: a reflective outer layer, a foam core for insulation, and a soft felt backing. Both provide excellent heat and UV protection and help keep your interior cooler.

The Premier Series, however, adds a more upscale look. It features a black backing and black binding around the edges, while the Original has a lighter gray color. The Premier also comes in premium finishes like Chrome Camouflage, Galaxy Silver, and white, which give it a more stylish appearance.

In short, both perform the same in terms of sun and heat protection, but the Premier Series offers a more refined design and added accessories. If aesthetics and presentation matter to you, the Premier is the better option. If you're focused strictly on function, the Original will serve you just as well. Hope this helps!
templates.name: What's the difference between USV100 original and USV100 premier?

templates.content: For dashmats, our standard procedure is to place embroidery and logos on the passenger side; however, there can be exceptions to that rule. If a dashboard is completely or mostly flat, we'll place them in the center of the mat, halfway between the driver and passenger. Depending on the way certain dashboards are designed, there sometimes isn't an ideal location to add them for good visibility, but we use our best judgment to position them where they can be easily seen.

templates.content:
We offer various types of seat covers, most of which are tailored specifically for each vehicle. PrecisionFit seat covers are snug-fitting and foam-backed, except for the Spacer Mesh material. These cannot be machine-washed due to the foam.

Marathon Excel seat covers are also snug fitting, made from our toughest material, Cordura, and are machine washable.

SeatSaver seat covers provide a great fit, but they are designed to be easily installed and removed for convenient machine washing. 

Bucket seat covers are typically a one-piece design with pillows that secure in between the seats for added security. Other designs are two-piece bucket seats, with a separate bottom and top that allow for a snug fit.

Anything labeled as Ready-Fit is a semi-custom design, so the fit may not be as precise as custom covers. These designs accommodate a wider range of patterns.
templates.name: What is the difference between precision and custom fit seat covers?

templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.covercraft.com/c/special-offers
templates.name: Sales Collection

templates.content: Measure your Travel Trailer from the longest two points to determine proper fit, including bumpers, spare tire and ladder - but excluding the hitch. ADCO Covers are designed to fit all common vehicle heights, however, we recommend double checking by taking the measurement of the vehicle sidewall height, excluding ground clearance. Cover is designed to accommodate rooftop accessories so no need to account for A/C's, vents, etc... when checking on height.
templates.name: How To Measure Your ADCO Travel Trailer?

templates.content:
We don't sell waterproof covers, and that's by design. Since 1965, we've been trusted by car owners to protect their vehicles with covers that are carefully engineered for long-term care. One of the biggest lessons we've learned in six decades of craftsmanship is that waterproof materials can do more harm than good. A true waterproof fabric doesn't breathe. That means any moisture, humidity, or gases trapped underneath have nowhere to escape. The result? Rust, corrosion, and even mold-the very problems you're trying to avoid. That's why especially our outdoor car covers are made with water-resistant, breathable fabrics designed to: 

• Shed most rainfall and block moisture from seeping in 
• Allow trapped heat and humidity to escape, protecting finishes and metalwork 
• Prevent rust and corrosion, keeping your vehicle safe for the long run 

By balancing water resistance with breathability, we ensure your cover protects without trapping damage underneath. So, while you won't find a "waterproof" car cover here, you'll get something better: a cover built with over 60 years of expertise-engineered to safeguard your vehicle the right way. View each material water repellency rating for which is best for your needs.
templates.name: Do you sell waterproof car covers?

templates.content:
The answer depends on the seat cover line and the specific pattern for your vehicle. Here's a breakdown by product line: Custom SeatSaver Seat Covers Designed for durability and everyday protection while being machine washable. Console covers are only included on bench style seats like 40/20/40 Bench, 50/50 Bench, 60/40 Bench, 40/60 Bench, etc... Bucket seats do not come with a console cover. 

Custom PrecisionFit Seat Covers Tailored for a premium, snug fit and most are foam-backed for extra comfort. Console covers are typically included for both bucket seats and bench seats. In some cases, certain console designs are too complex to be covered. 

Custom Marathon Seat Covers Built tough for work and adventure and machine washable. Console covers are usually included for both bucket seats and bench seats. In some cases, certain console designs are too complex to be covered. Ready-Fit Seat Covers Universal-style fit for quick protection. Do not include console covers. 

Sheepskin Seat Covers Luxurious comfort and style. Do not include console covers for bucket or bench seats, but a matching console cover can be ordered separately.
templates.name: Do Your Seat Covers Come with a Console Cover?

templates.content: We can embroider on the front of the car cover. We don't offer the feature online for car covers, but you can call us at 1-800-274-7006.
